ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure
Class DecisionAdapter

java.lang.Object
  BaseAdapter
      ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.DecisionAdapter

public class DecisionAdapter
extends BaseAdapter

This is the Adapter class for Decisions that allows them to be displayed in list-views. The DecisionAdapter aggregates Decisions and is responsible for generating the views to visualize a decision.
